vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
Demo.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(ERC20(_token).transferFrom(_from,_tos[i],_values[i])) (patch_10.sol#16)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_from' of Demo.transfer (patch_10.sol#5) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_token' of Demo.transfer (patch_10.sol#6) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_tos' of Demo.transfer (patch_10.sol#7) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_values' of Demo.transfer (patch_10.sol#8) is not in mixedCase
